title: Champion glitches around
body: So my champion glitches around when I'm right clicking.  I know for a fact it has nothing to do with my connection, because all other champions do not glitch around.  And my ping is constantly at 65 with a FPS of 200+

replies.body: What do you mean by glitching out?  Is the game crashing?  Can you provide any screenshots?  I'd like to help, but need more details so I understand what exactly is going on.  Let me know!

Can you ensure that *Movement Prediction* is not enabled under your in-game settings? This feature can cause these types of symptoms if it's enabled on a good connection. Below is a screenshot showing how to disable this feature:

https://imgur.com/a/OSXlP

Let me know if this worked!
